com.dryver.Activities

Class ActivityDryverMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.dryver.Activities.ActivityLoggedInActionBar
              • com.dryver.Activities.ActivityDryverMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener

    public class ActivityDryverMain
extends ActivityLoggedInActionBar
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener
    This activities deals with providing the driver with UI for requests. Uses Google services for some of the geolocation functionalities

    Implements ActivityLoggedInActionBar for some of the UI features

    See Also:
    GoogleApiClient, RequestSingleton, UserController
